definition: can't stand it/to be unable to bear/to be unable to resist
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
surname Jing
(negative prefix)/not/no

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
does not bear examination

sentences.english: Melanie was so delicate. She couldn't stand two days of this pain .
sentences.chinese: 可是媚兰身体这样娇弱，她一定经不起两天的折磨。

sentences.english: The country can't afford another flood.
sentences.chinese: 该国经不起再受一次水灾了。

sentences.english: Heh as a good sense of humour, but he isn't able tot ake a joke.
sentences.chinese: 他很有幽默感，却经不起别人与自己开玩笑。

sentences.english: The two drawings tell us that flowers raised in a greenhouse cannot brave harsh weather conditions.
sentences.chinese: 这两幅图告诉我们，温室养大的花根本经不起风雨。

sentences.english: The possible young heart to be too soft, after does not get windy, after not uprise.
sentences.chinese: 可能年少的心太柔软，经不起风，经不起浪。

sentences.english: The possible young heart to be too soft, after does not get windy, after not uprise.
sentences.chinese: 可能年少的心太柔软，经不起风，经不起浪。

sentences.english: If that promise is like the wind not tested.
sentences.chinese: 说好的承诺是否会像风一样经不起考验。

sentences.english: His weak arguments won't bear examination.
sentences.chinese: 他的论据无力，经不起推究。

sentences.english: Fragile body, is really cannot afford the time.
sentences.chinese: 娇气，是身体真的经不起岁月了。

sentences.english: Those punks couldn’t bear the interrogation; a tad bitter taste of it just brought them all to confession.
sentences.chinese: 那些浑小子经不起讯问，吃了点苦头全都说了。

sentences.english: Without the core our party wouldn't stand the test of difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 没有这样一个核心，党就经不起风浪考验。

sentences.english: His irritation could not withstand the silent beauty of the night .
sentences.chinese: 他的烦恼经不起这宁静的良宵美景的感染。

sentences.english: Cummer is ground forcedly via removing me to tangle to death, acquiesced.
sentences.chinese: 女友经不起我死缠硬磨，默许了。
他的理论经不起周密的审察。
